divs: Sighting Detailspassanger in car...gazed up at the sky..we new it was not of this planet..football shape hovering with metal like color exs underneath along with something that appeared to look like a curtin beneath the football shape..i felt amazed at what we! seen was in news paper and there were multi sightings in the weeks to come lost sight when it took off in a sw direction frm the bridge I am now a 44yr old truck driver and have lived in Nevada and traveled all over the usa and have had multi sightings in different states I am NOT!!!!!!! a fraud you have my email just email me and maybe we can talk in the future being that I cant give my number but I am willing to do so if ur serious as I am thank you !!!!! and keep ur eyes on the skys......
